en.title: Cookie Policy
en.subtitle: How we use cookies on Linguify to enhance your language learning experience.

sections.title: What is a cookie?
content: A cookie is a small data file stored on your device when you visit our website. Cookies help us recognize you during subsequent visits and personalize your experience.
We use different types of cookies to make our language learning platform work and improve your user experience.

sections.title: Types of cookies we use
content: We use the following types of cookies on Linguify:
items: **Essential cookies**: Necessary for basic site functionality (login, security, language preferences)
**Performance cookies**: Help us understand how you use our site to improve it
**Functionality cookies**: Remember your preferences and personalize your learning experience
**Analytics cookies**: Collect information about your site usage anonymously

sections.title: First-party cookies
content: These cookies are directly placed by Linguify and include:
items: **linguify_session**: Maintains your login session (expires when browser closes)
**linguify_language**: Remembers your language preference (expires after 1 year)
**linguify_theme**: Remembers your light/dark theme choice (expires after 1 year)
**linguify_progress**: Saves your learning progress (expires after 2 years)
**linguify_consent**: Remembers your cookie preferences (expires after 1 year)

sections.title: Third-party cookies
content: We also use third-party services that may place their own cookies:
items: **Google Analytics**: To analyze site usage (_ga, _gid cookies)
**Stripe**: For secure payment processing (only on payment pages)

sections.title: Managing your cookie preferences
content: You have full control over the cookies used on our site:
• **Essential cookies**: Always active as they're necessary for site functionality
• **Other cookies**: You can accept or refuse them via our cookie banner
• **Browser settings**: You can configure your browser to block or delete cookies

sections.title: Retention periods
content: The retention periods for our cookies vary based on their function:
items: **Progress cookies**: Kept for 2 years to preserve your learning

sections.title: Your rights
content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
• Know which cookies are used on your device
• Withdraw your consent at any time
• Request deletion of your cookie data

contact.title: Questions about our cookie policy?
contact.description: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please don't hesitate to contact us.
